titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for the prices of victuals within the verge of the court.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at Our Court of Whitehall the fifth day of Nouember in the eleuenth yeere of Our reigne of England, France and Ireland, And of Scotland the seuen and fortieth."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
